sys_ui_macro.name: selectTemplates
sys_ui_macro.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
<g:dialog_button title = "Use this button to add Templates" onClick = "select_Temp()" name = "select_temp" id = "temp_button" type = "button">Select Templates'</g:dialog_button>
	<script>
		function select_Temp(){
			//alert('Running Script from UI Macro');
			var dialog = new GlideDialogWindow('x_amfai_cacmdba_select_templates');
			dialog.setTitle("Select Templates'");
			dialog.render();
		}
	</script>
</j:jelly>
